select ic.comment_level as commentLevel, ic.content as content, ic.sepc_name as specName, ic.created_time as createdTime, u.face as userFace, u.nickname as nickName from items_comments ic left join users u on ic.user_id = u.id -- Check how the variable to sql where ic.item_id = #{paramsMap.itemId}
and ic.comment_level = #{paramsMap.level}

SELECT i.item_name as itemName, i.id as itemId, i.sell_counts as sellCounts, tempSpec.price_discount as price, ii.url as imgUrl FROM items as i LEFT JOIN items_img as ii on i.id = ii.item_id LEFT JOIN ( SELECT item_id, MIN(price_discount) as price_discount FROM items_spec GROUP BY item_id ) tempSpec ON i.id = tempSpec.item_id WHERE ii.is_main = 1
AND i.item_name LIKE '%${paramsMap.keywords}%'
order by
i.sell_counts desc
tempSpec.price_discount asc
i.item_name asc
